title: Can support mains get sheilding amount in end game stats? Any other stats wanted?
body:
As a support main that is currently in a Karma phase, I would love to know how much shielding I provide to the team. There is healing done in end game stats I believe there should also be shielding done.

So I ask the question are there any other stats players want to see in end game stats?

Damage prevented. (Including damage reduction through resistances)
Damage prevented for allies.
Let's not forget "Damage given" or whatever sexier name you prefer, for Sona's Blue, Leona's passive, Nami's empowered AA and all Ardent Censer's passive on-hit.
Damage dealt?

All the things I mentioned are credited to the empowered champion, not to the empowering champion. If Soraka buff your AAs with Ardent Censer, in end-of-game stats, it buffs YOUR stats, not hers, which leads to a few champions severely under-estimating their real output in a game.

Same for Leona's passive triggered by allies damage: it's credited to the ally triggering the passive, not to Leona herself.
Same for the AA buffs that Sona or Nami can give: credited to the champion doing the AA, not to Sona/Nami herself.
Same for the AD buff on Janna's shield. Boosts the shielded ally's stats, not Janna's.
I'm not sure, but I think even Braum's passive stun (and the associated damage) is credited to the person dealing the 4th blow, so often not Braum himself.

So next time, before downvoting, check your facts.

I didn't downvote...
But can't we just change that to match it? Is there a good reason for splitting damage dealt directly by you and indirectly by you?

Splitting it makes more sense to see the impact of supporting vs. fighting. If you included "damage given" into "damage dealt", it only tells you "you made this much damage happen" instead of "you did this much damage yourself, and enabled your teammates to do that amount of damage"
Not sure that's the real reason, see my other comment directly to 500000.

Stats have no affect on earning gold. If you last-hit any unit (including champions), you'll get the gold. Another 50% of that gold is split up among those who assisted. Bounties are split up among the team regardless of contribution towards the kill.

If the ADC auto-attacks a target for the last-hit with Leona's passive on them, if you change the system so that the damage from the passive is credited to Leona, then Leona "did" the last-hit and will get the gold. In the current system, the ADC gets the gold, because the damage from Leona passive is still credited to him. (And that's true for Champions but also for Minions, Bounties are irrelevant here.)

In the current system, Leona's bonus damage is recorded as a separate damage proc, yet still owned by the ADC. That damage is _literally given_ to the ADC, all they have to record what was given and credit it to the support in the after-game statistics, it won't change how they earn gold from kills.

Yeah, there's one reason, don't know if it's a good one or not: it changes who gets the gold for a last hit/kill. E.g. if a champion dies to Leona passive, it's still her ADC that gets the gold, because the damage "comes from" the ADC. Idem for all others.

YES PLEASE, i've honestly been asking this for a while
damage shielded

(PLEASE SEPERATE THESE NUMBERS!!! i can't tell you how confusing it is to be a top laner with corrupting potion and have the game say i've 'healed' more than the alister in bot lane)

this would be a HUGE help to supports 

one thing i would LOVE to see. a "savior' notification, even if it's only a little thing in chat. i think it would be an awesome thing for a support to be told 'you saved this guy' or have that carry be told 'your support just saved your life'

i realize that riot can't account for every  'would they have died here' but if lulu shields kalista from karthas ult or braum blocks  caitlyn ult. it would be awesome just for that little bit of acknowledgement

I think one 'issue' with the support role in league is that there's almost no recognition for it. the only stats endgame are 'healed' (which is... literally broken i think) and 'damage taken' which is so arbitrary it barely means anything. More stats for supports would help a little bit in making them feel a bit better about playing the roll

-Duration of CC applied. This one is a must.

-Damage mitigated by shields, ults etc is a must too and i dont know why rito doesnt include this. (i dont know how ults like zilean would be counted tho..)

-Structures assisted, damage to structures done. Because "turrets/inhibs destroyed" is gay and random because it just counts the last hit.

-Wards used, area covered by wards.
Damn sheilding

Want damage to objectives. People tunneling so hard @damage to champs stats now they bitch when I dont have massive damage to champs as Tank/Juggernaught junglers despite getting tons of dragons, downing towers then CCing & soaking the enemy for our carries to kill, its like they expect assassin levels of damage

The biggest one is something ill never be able to get, "lives saved". Because a lot of the times you save a life no death or kill will come out of it so the game doesn't know it happened.

You can flash in front of a Cait ultra to save your ADC but the game only know the enemy Cait used her ultimate, that you used flash, and that your ADC took a lot of damage. It can't interpret that kind of situation so ill never get to see the stat I want to see most and our end game rankings will always be lower because of it.

I'm loving the ideas I'm reading.

As as Support main, one of the most frustrating things is not seeing the work I put into the game. People say, "Oh if your ADC or teammates were fed then blah blah blah." No, I want real numbers to show my contribution to the game.

Not only because players tend to overlook the support's role in the match, but also because I want to see what I need to work on for the next game. Assists don't always tell the full story either. KDA isn't always a useful stat on a Support.

If Riot is going to ignore us for another season, I would at least like us to be able to see our contribution in the stats.
Percentage of hooks/snares landed for naut, thresh, blitz, morg, etc. would be fun, but not necessary

**Total Shield amount given.** 
*(All of it, not just what prevented damage)*
**Damage shielded.** 
*(Just what prevented damage, not all of it.)*

**Time spent CC'd.** 
*(Because it's good to know how much CC you tanked)*
**Duration of CC done to enemies.**
*(Because obviously.)*
**Amount of enemies killed due to your CC.** *
(So, like, every enemy that died about 5 seconds after you applied CC to their faces.)*

**Amount of stacks.** 
*(Stack specific champions. Veigar, Nasus, Thresh, Bard, Sion, Kindred.)*
**Highest amount of burst.** 
*(Think "Highest amount of total damage within 3-4 seconds." I want to see the ridiculous score a fed Veigar would be getting.)*

I want these. These are the ones I want. I would be happy to get these, but the shielding ones and the burst one are the ones I want most.

Turrets Assisted

I only want the shielding to show pre-mitigation damage tho... like, how much damage did I stop my teammates from receiving? Because sometimes you shield and it turns out you didn't need it and it just runs out... I dont care about those shields.

Although i think that "Damage Shielded" is a great stat, I dont think it can be used in a vacuum. 300HP shield on a carry is different than 300hp shield on a tank. So if youre going to have a "Damage Shielded" stat, you probably want a "Damage Mitigated by Shields" stat. And a "Damage mitigation" stat for tanks. 


Because I can see it leading to confusion - whenever you shield carries you might inflate your numbers compared to shielding tanks, but shielding tanks actually prevents more damage even if the shield doesnt tank more damage.

Yeah I dunno why it's not there either. 

*I guess* you could make comparisons with how much damage your team tanks vs when you're playing a non-shield support?
Probably impossible, but I would like "amount of times you saved an ally from certain death".
